title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 227.1 - Authority, intent and purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 227.1 - Authority, intent and purpose

State Regulations
(a) Statutory authority: General Municipal Law Section 204-dd; (b) The intent and purpose of this part is to
establish minimum qualifications for a fire chief in any fire department or
fire company that employs six (6) or more paid fire fighters in the State of

New York. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
227.1

Adopted by

New

York State Register June 2, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 22, eff. 6/2/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
